dict.acceptation: 肥的；胖的；油腻的；丰满的；
脂肪；肥肉；（食用的）动植物油；（人体摄入的动植物）脂肪；

sent.orig: Also note that FAT tables in the second partition are smaller than in the first one.
sent.trans: 同样还需要注意到，在第二个分区中的FAT表要比第一个的小。

sent.orig: Note that the LFN feature on the FAT file system is a patent of Microsoft Corporation.
sent.trans: 请注意：FAT文件系统的LFN特性是微软公司的专利。

sent.orig: Unable to compress or decompress FAT volumes.
I want to stay slim, so I'm taking weight-loss pills called Fat-less.
sent.trans: 我想保持身体苗条，因此我就一直服用名叫Fat-less的瘦身药。

sent.orig: Attend Factory Acceptance Tests (FAT) as required.
sent.trans: 如有必要，参加工厂验收测试(FAT)。
